title: visual bug with Gangplank B animation
body: When gangplank backs, his animation shows him sitting down on thin air instead of his crate, so his crates missing basically. Only happens with his classic skin

replies.body:
Hiya NLRnight,

Thanks for the update! This is a known issue, and the team is working on a fix. Lemme poke them and see where they're on it, as this has been occurring for a bit.
